headline: Duke Energy Balances Dividend Appeal With Growing Renewable Investment Focus
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) is highlighting its role as a dividend-focused utility while increasing its mix of renewable and cleaner energy projects. The company is emphasizing a balanced approach between its existing regulated power assets and new energy transition investments. This development is drawing attention from investors who prioritize steady income and are interested in lower carbon energy exposure. Duke Energy is a large regulated utility that supplies electricity and related...
